name: Auto Ping Booster
author: Samee Ullah Feroz

sections.description:
1. Use this plugin to ping your blog, post, pages, images, docs files, on daily basis.
  2. Auto Ping Booster will auto Ping your blog in Google Blogsearch after every update.
  3. Auto Ping Booster is known about SEO Booster.
  4. Just upload auto-ping-booster.zip file to plugin directory or upload it by plugin option in menu and active it. It works automatically itself.
  5. Once you update your post or blog, your update will be automatically pinged to top pinger sites.
  6. Your post will be on google indexing within 10 to 15 minutes.
  7. Google, Yandex, PingoMatic, NewsGator and top services.
  8. For More Information Contact Digital Marketing Specialist
  9. If your target country is China, Install Baidu Ping Booster
sections.installation:
1. Upload auto-ping-booster.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload auto-ping-booster.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
How does this plugin work?
This plugin ping your blog to Google blog search on each update.

short_description: Auto Ping Booster will auto ping your blog in Google, Baidu, Yandex and many search engines after each update.
